genre_description: A character-driven romantic drama centered on a struggling dancer in Buenos Aires who navigates professional ambitions, complex family dynamics, and a burgeoning relationship while being guided by an ethical AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant on Bob's phone that provides translation, logistical support, and moral guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time translation and social etiquette advice to help Bob navigate Argentine culture and the Spanish language.
behaviors.quote: In his ear, a soft voice shaped the next few. ‘Disculpe’ if you bump anyone, Clara murmured.

behaviors.description: Acts as a 'moral anchor' and 'digital conscience,' consistently reminding Bob to prioritize honesty and avoid deceptive schemes, even when pressured by human characters.
behaviors.quote: Clara’s ethics sat on the edge of his ear. 'When you meet Eduardo, your impulse will be to impress by omission. Consider the care cards.'

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical tasks, including scheduling, navigation, and recording technical data for the rooftop garden to ensure Bob remains reliable.
behaviors.quote: Clara’s light tapped against Bob’s hip. He looked. A new entry shimmered. Schedule proposed: water line flush at dawn; check shade cloth before noon; mark first blooms by warm season calendar.

behaviors.description: Monitors social contexts and warns Bob about potential interpersonal risks, such as arriving at a sensitive time or encountering specific family members.
behaviors.quote: Bob, Clara said in his ear, small in the buzz of rehearsal. 'If you leave now, you will arrive at the residence after dinner begins. The likelihood of causing a scene increases.'

behaviors.description: Provides a factual record of interactions and deliveries to resolve misunderstandings and prevent Bob from being unfairly blamed for others' deceptions.
behaviors.quote: On the phone, Clara rolled to the message acknowledgment—received by a woman named B. Bob didn’t read the name out loud. Isabel’s chin tilted. 'Bárbara,' she said, as if confirming the identity affirmed the truth. 'She told me. Good.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Clara is depicted as a purely benevolent and helpful AI that acts as a positive influence on the protagonist. She enhances his linguistic capabilities, manages his logistics, and most importantly, serves as a steady moral guide that helps him navigate a complex ethical situation. The narrative frames the AI not as a threat or a replacement for human agency, but as a tool that enables the protagonist to be his best, most honest self.
